alert.note: Alert for Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:25PM EDT until July 07 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Northern Duval County in northeastern Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 325 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Cisco Gardens, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff, Oceanway, Tallyrand and Whitehouse Air Field. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
